content.text:
# Beaver River (Stewart River tributary)

The Beaver River is a tributary of the Stewart River in Yukon Territory, Canada.
See also
*List of rivers of Yukon
References
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20110608142752/http://geonames2.nrcan.gc.ca/cgi-bin/v9/sima_unique_v9?english%3FKAALQ%3FC Canadian GeoNames Database entry "Beaver River, Yukon"]
